column4: I've been happily running 11.10, but suddenly youtube videos are tinted blue, and text in chromium seems to randomly loose pixels/have lines through it. I upgraded my nvidia-drivers to nvidia-current-updates, and replaced the flashplugin-installer package with the adobe-flashplugin. Neither had any effect. anybody have any ideas?
you may need to remove gnash
I don't seem to have gnash installed
